title: Uber | L4 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: Govt College ranked similar to good NITs
Years of Experience: 3
Date of the Offer: Oct, 2024
Current Org: Google (L3)
Current TC: 58L
Company: Uber
Title/Level: SDE - 2 (L4)
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 50L (Including PF)
Stock bonus: $70K (4 years, 25%)
Performance Bonus: 6.75L
Joining Bonus: 5L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~77L (1st Year), ~72L (2nd Year)

Declined as got promoted and the new TC is similar to the one offered.

title: Salesforce | LMTS | Bengaluru | Ghosted | DECLINED
content:
Education: BE (Information Technology)
Years of Experience: 12
Date of the Offer: Oct 2024
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: LMTS
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 75L
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: $100K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: 15% => 1125000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~1.07 Cr
Benefits: Usual perks

Lowballed offer, tried negotiating but recuiter ghosted, finally DECLINED.
